title: Pixel 4 XL Google 'Screen attention' stops working after some time, requires reboot to start working
content:
I have an issues with my Pixel 4 XL.

The 'screen attention' functionality stops working after a while, this is fixed by a reboot. It appears that the phone is going into some kind of sleep mode that is shutting down certain functions.

I have tried changing the battery optimisation settings for the 'Google' app, but this didn't help.
